attributes.action: Reduce MP’s wages by 2% to give NHS workers pay rise
attributes.additional_details: I believe they are the most important people in the country at the moment, there would be so many extra deaths if we didn’t have NHS staff. And as MP’s are voted in by the public then we should have a say where our public  money goes.
attributes.background: I would like the government to think about reducing MP’s wages to free up cash to give the NHS workers a better rate of pay, after all the COVID-19 they deserve it.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:
http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/

You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
